review: These Hillman hex nuts are exactly what I needed for my project. The zinc coating provides a reliable corrosion-resistant finish, and the threads are clean and precise, ensuring a secure fit. The nuts are well-made and consistent, which is crucial for maintaining the integrity of any build. At this price point, they offer excellent value for money, and I'm confident they will last as long as needed. Highly recommend for anyone looking for durable and reliable fasteners.
